corporation_system.description: Corporations are the primary social organizations in New Eden. Every player belongs to a corporation, either NPC or player-run. Corporations provide shared resources, tax revenue, and organizational structure.

caldari_navy.name: Caldari Navy
caldari_navy.description: The naval arm of the Caldari State, responsible for defending Caldari sovereignty.

caldari_provisions.name: Caldari Provisions
caldari_provisions.description: A major Caldari corporation providing goods and services throughout the State.

amarr_navy.name: Amarr Navy
amarr_navy.description: The imperial fleet of the Amarr Empire, the largest navy in New Eden.

ministry_of_war.name: Ministry of War
ministry_of_war.description: Oversees the Amarr Empire's military operations and defense strategy.

federation_navy.name: Federation Navy
federation_navy.description: The military arm of the Gallente Federation, champions of freedom in New Eden.

republic_fleet.name: Republic Fleet
republic_fleet.description: The Minmatar Republic's defense force, built from reclaimed and improvised ships.

core_complexion.name: Core Complexion Inc.
core_complexion.description: A Minmatar research corporation with R&D agents available for scientific research.

creodron.name: Creodron
creodron.description: A Gallente research corporation specializing in drone technology and starship engineering.

carthum_conglomerate.name: Carthum Conglomerate
carthum_conglomerate.description: An Amarr research corporation with advanced R&D programs.

ishukone_corporation.name: Ishukone Corporation
ishukone_corporation.description: One of the Caldari mega-corporations with advanced research capabilities.

ceo.name: CEO
ceo.description: Full control over all corporation functions.

director.name: Director
director.description: Has most CEO powers except dissolving the corporation.

accountant.name: Accountant
accountant.description: Can view and manage corporation wallet.

offices.description: Corporations can rent offices at stations for storage and operations.

standings.description: Corporation standings affect access to agents, tax rates at stations, and NPC behavior. Standing is gained through missions and lost through hostile actions.

effects.above_5: Access to level 4 agents, reduced broker fees.
effects.3_to_5: Access to level 3 agents, standard broker fees.
effects.below_0: Restricted access, higher fees, faction police may engage.
